## Data Quality Analysis

 Reading the file

```{r}
art = read.csv("sothebys_data.csv", na.strings=c(""," ","NA"))
```

Let us start by looking at all the missing values and if there are any patterns.

```{r}
#Replace (Other) with NA for consistency
art_clean <- lapply(art, gsub, pattern='(Other)', replacement=NA)
#Save as a data frame
art_df <- as_data_frame(art_clean)

art_final <- art_df %>% gather(date, value) %>% mutate(missing = ifelse(is.na(value), "yes", "no"))
ggplot(art_final, aes(x = date, y = fct_rev(id), fill = missing)) +
  geom_tile(color = "white") +
  ggtitle("Art Data with NAs") +
  #scale_fill_viridis() +
  theme_bw()
```

summary(art)
